name: Toolserver
short_description:
A single repository in which all the fisheye.toolserver.org repositories have been merged, preserving the original directory structure as is. Obviously, revision numbers have not been preserved.

The original SVN filesystem/DB has been copied from the tarball at https://archive.org/history/toolserver-svn (kindly provided by nosy, Wikimedia Deutschland's); SVN dumps were produced and merged like https://stackoverflow.com/a/267307/4145951 .

If you want to resume serious work on one of the repositories here, it's probably better to download the tarball, extract, cd to the directory of your repository, "svnadmin dump > repo.dump", create your repository where you prefer and import the dump. Also, for serious imports/conversions http://www.catb.org/esr/reposurgeon/ is recommended.
summary: Copy of the toolserver.org repositories, to browse and download.
